entity.name: Trump says he discussed Venezuela and the Mueller report with Putin in an hour-long call
entity.description: President Trump confirmed the call in a series of Tweets on Friday, adding that the political turmoil in Venezuela was also a subject of a phone conversation with Russia's Vladimir Putin. Referring to the report's conclusion that Russia interfered in the 2016 election while clearing the Trump campaign of conspiracy, Trump said he and Putin discussed the "Russia Hoax."

entity.name: Fears of a global coronavirus pandemic as cases of reported infections surge
entity.description: A rapid surge of new coronavirus cases outside of China, including in Iran, South Korea and Italy, has prompted concerns among infectious disease experts and scientists that the contagion could transform into a global pandemic. The virus had spread to at least 28 countries with more than 76,000 confirmed cases worldwide.

text: @PreetBharara Coronavirus...a nurse on the frontline and Trump cut the CDC funding so drastically, that we are ill prepared for a local epidemic or worldwide pandemic. There is a national shortage of masks and hospital admin is hoarding them. The general election will be stolen by Putin!
